```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Load packages

```{r packages}
library(googlesheets4)
library(sf)
library(leaflet)
library(stringr)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
```

## Read data

Read in data from Google Sheet.

```{r read_data}
df <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1KuzKNWn-ZxbhKwkdaj1CnzyqsKN6Pxm1HxoNpTqErhM/edit?resourcekey=&gid=729659319#gid=729659319")
```

## Transform data

```{r transform}
# Rename columns
df <- df %>%
    rename("timestamp" = 1, "coords" = 2, "name" = 3, "is_working" = 4,
           "descr" = 5, "photo" = 6)
```
